amendment.description: To stop Federal subsidies for ongoing beach renourishment from being extended to 65 years.

vote.text: Amendment SA 815 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 43 - 53. Record Vote Number: 121.

action.text: Amendment SA 815 proposed by Senator Coburn.
